The Volunteer Economy

We are a non-profit volunteer member-owned collaborative that Connects organizations to Volunteers who can earn Rewards by participating.

Learn more Sign up

How Does It Work?

Learn how we are creating free healthcare, education and economic opportunities for volunteer members.

01

Connect

With our vast network of volunteers available on standy for immediate support, organizations can reach out and connect with qualified volunteers. On the flipside, volunteers search through open opportunities to earn credits by volunteering.

Learn More

02

Volunteer

At the heart of Volunteer Economy is giving back to the community by producing of network of local volunteers ready to server for the well-being of our environment, health, education, economy & social justice.

Learn More

03

Rewards

Volunteer time equals relationship currency. Accumulate time earned through volunteering into reimbursable credits to be used for anything from higher education, healthcare, basic needs, and much more as we continue to partner with organizations nationwide.

Learn More

The Voluneer Network

The online application connects volunteers with organizations fast and easily through the simple process of signing up for opportunities, organization approval process, and time tracking. Volunteers then claim rewards all through the online platform, at home or on the go.

Dashboard

Track all your volunteer hours and reward credits from all organizations at a glance.

Claim Rewards

Effortlessly browse through avilable rewards and turn hours into dollars.

Instant

Direct access between volunteers and organizations means immediate support.

Customize

Volunteers select interests to better search for opportunities they care about.

Support

Get Involved

Donating to The Volunteer Economy helps grow the program to other communities and launch new innovative tools and applications. Your donations will go towards aiding suffering veterans and the poor of the world and helping them meet their basic needs (safety, security, food, clothing, shelter, light, air & water) and advanced needs (healthcare, education, jobs, new venture creation, etc.).

Donate Now
or speak with a representative
